entry.title: Development Roadmap of Bitcoin Core 0.9.2
entry.summary: In this context, the author mentions that the latest nightly build is not compatible with Tails/Debian Squeeze and wonders if there is an intention to address this issue. The author also asks if the issue might be fixed by version 0.9.2. To clarify the problem, Wladimir asks the author to be more specific about their issue.
